title: Feedback Widget & Offline Mode
items: Added floating feedback widget for user feedback and bug reports.
Offline mode: view cached meetups when offline.
Performance optimizations: dynamic imports, lazy loading.

title: Admin & Moderation Enhancements
items: Admin can change user roles.
Bulk actions and audit logs groundwork.
Improved i18n for admin dashboard.

title: Major Refactor, PWA, GDPR/CCPA, and More
items: Massive refactor: modularized all components into domain-specific folders for maintainability and scalability.
Unified avatar rendering and improved accessibility across the app.
Full i18n support for admin, moderation, and user features (English/Russian).
Semantic color palette and dark mode improvements.
RSVP and 'Add to Calendar' features for meetups.
Admin Dashboard: tabs for Users, Meetups, and Reports, with moderation actions (resolve, dismiss, escalate).
User reporting: flag icon, modal, Firestore integration, error handling.
Shared confirmation and error dialogs for admin/user actions.
User management: admins can change user roles (with Firestore integration).
PWA: manifest, service worker, install prompt, and offline mode (caching meetups and static assets).
Offline banner for users when offline.
Performance: dynamic imports for heavy admin components, image optimization confirmed.
FeedbackWidget: floating button, modal, Firestore integration, i18n.
'What's New' page with changelog and navigation item.
ThemeCustomizer: users can pick accent colors, persisted in localStorage.
Settings page: theme, dark mode, language selector, and user data controls.
GDPR/CCPA: 'Download My Data' and 'Delete My Account' (with backend endpoints).
Language and theme preferences persisted in localStorage.
Custom ThemeProvider and LocaleProvider for correct hydration and toggling.
Vercel environment variable setup instructions added.
